scripts.setup: npm install pg express ejs sequelize && npx sequelize-cli init && mkdir controllers views && touch controller.js home.ejs app.js && touch .gitignore && echo node_modules >> .gitignore
scripts.dbInstall: npx sequelize-cli db:drop && npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
